About Jonny

I'm Jonny. I like to write. Sometimes I write code, sometimes music, sometimes lyrics. Other times, I simply jot down insane and incoherent thoughts. This is where I spew thoughts of advice, wisdom, rage, and/or insanity. Read some. They may be inspirational....or encourage thoughts of homicide and a disgust towards humanity.

WARNING

These writings may be brash, terse, or very profane. These are published at my discretion and read at yours.

Started: April 23th, 2014
Last updated: 2014-05-06 11:28:40 -0500
